description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget, RoomDetailsScreen, which displays detailed information about a room and facilitates navigation to a booking flow.

classes.name: RoomDetailsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that shows detailed information about a specific room and provides navigation to initiate booking.

methods.name: fromRouteArguments
methods.description: A static method that creates an instance of RoomDetailsScreen from navigation arguments, extracting a Room object if present.

methods.name: _goToBooking
methods.description: A private method that navigates to the booking screen, passing the selected room's ID and data.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Overrides StatelessWidget's build method to render the UI based on whether room data is available, including layout and interaction logic.
